00016     static void showCamInfo(CamInfo cam_info)
00017     {
00018         std::cout << std::endl << "=== begin CamInfo ===" << std::endl

00025             << "part_version: " << cam_info.part_version << std::endl
00026             << "permitted_access: " << cam_info.permitted_access << std::endl

00028             << "serial_string: " << cam_info.serial_string << std::endl
00029             << "unique_id: " << cam_info.unique_id << std::endl
00030             << "===  end CamInfo  ===" << std::endl << std::endl;
00031         //cam_info.
00032     }

00034     static void showCamInfos(std::vector<CamInfo> &cam_infos)
00035     {
00036         int inum = cam_infos.size();
00037         std::cout << "Found " << inum<< " cameras:\n";
00038         for(int i=0;i<inum;i++)
00039             showCamInfo(cam_infos[i]);
00040     }
